name: The Detective and the Mystery of the Cracked Egg (Standalone)
name_original: The Detective and the Mystery of the Cracked Egg (Standalone)
description:
The Detective and the Mystery of the Cracked Egg Standalone version of my SAE Student Level Design Project
Created by Devan Laczko-Twomey

You were tasked to uncover the mystery of the cracked egg. You must go around and talk to everyone so that you can discover who is to blame here.

Controls:

WASD for Movement.

Walk up to the NPCs to talk to them.
(Controls subject to change in later development)

It is recommended that you use the itch.io desktop app to automatically update the game with every prototype release.
